acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should assign exactly the values specified with the @PodamStrategyValue annotation
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldAssignExactValuesDefinedInPodamStrategyValueAnnotation

test-step.description: Given a standard Podam Factory
